"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5519e0fd6368726ce4d30900#post_5519e0fd6368726ce4d30900
I'm beyond sick and playing FEAR: perseus mandate.

I've officially ran out of games to play.  I have borderlands but that's WAY too easy to beat to the point I can't enjoy it.  Contagion was going to be good but they fucked it up at the last second and it's not optimized and runs like garbage.  I am Alive wasn't that good.  Jet set Radio for steam got the controls butchered; I want to play it but holy hell.

I'm waiting for a steam sale to get the games on my wishlist.
